item_category: HUAWEI P30 Lite is built for seamless mobile experience. P30 Lite features a 6.15 inch screen, a 48MP ultra high definition lens, powerful AI recognition technology, a slim 3D curved glass design crafted for easy grip and one handed use. Available in three colours, including an eye catching iridescent gradient colour finish.

review_text: I bought this a few weeks ago its a great phone and well priced

I've bought this phone for my parents because its easy to use and it is great for them.
Fab phone, charges quick and takes a nice photo (not Google or iPhone standard but still great). Has everything you could want and doesn't cost the earth!

Daughter's camera on her old mobile got smashed (long story) and had previous one for almost 3 years so replaced rather than repaired.

Camera on this one is so much better, as well as other functions.
Definitely worth the money and one happy teenager to go with it!
Great! everything you need in a phone, recommend by a friend and wish I had bought one earlier?

Nice, basic model smart phone with enough features for your average user. Set up was easy and automatic, simple even for a technophobe like me. The functions are easy to navigate, very user friendly. Picture quality is good, sound quality good. Camera could be better but overall very happy with my new phone!
I just wanted a good phone without paying stupid prices as they can easily get damaged at work and this ticks all the boxes for what I need.
Is OK because good quality.
Can't belive I had over paid for an iPhone for so long. This phone has all the things you want and at a very cheap price compared to market leaders. Would 100% recommend.
Love this phone. Nice big screen, sleek design and great value for money.

Love Huawei phones, so much tech for such a good value price. This phone is quick! I got one model up from my previous, and I thought my old phone (P9 Light) was good but this is super good. The camera is amazing, and videos are great too. Fab memory. Charges quick and lasts me all day. Great design and very very clear screen, really happy with it and have already recommended to a friend looking for a new phone! It is a different charger than my previous Huawei's but i didn't mind!
Great little phone, really good price for a good smart phone. Easy to use.

Entry level phone that is anything but.

I outgrew my phone's 32Gb memory as I use a lot of apps.
Obviously I can't speak for long term reliability but the manufacturer is offering 2 year warranty and that's how long I expect my phones to last, so no unplanned replacement cost. The memory at 128Gb isn't even breaking a sweat. I use it all day every day and it's coping well. It's competing very well with my company phone, which is one of the flagship models from another manufacturer. Never bought from them before but would again.

Does all the things I expect quick nice photo and good apps battery good nice size to hold in hand and thought I was plastic but dropped and it glass front and face reconshion is good touch unlock good

Apart from the above, this phone is relatively easy to use, hence I’d recommend it to all and sundry.

O2 and EE will allow a change of mind period of about 2 weeks but not Argos. I’ve now bought an iPhone 8 and my life is complete again.
